expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to 'pattern <A-F>' mode based on 'pattern B' in arguments
Agent reads references/patterns.md to load pattern B details
Agent presents Pattern B (Agent team with file ownership) with ASCII diagrams and key rules
Agent explains when to use Pattern B: cross-domain features, large refactors requiring 3+ domain-crossing streams
Agent includes the recovery ladder and accounting rule specific to team-based execution
